entry.title: Detection vs Tracking: A computer vision approach
Jorge Martinez - An artistic neural style algorithm - PyCon Colombia 2019
What happens when the main maintainer of a project takes a step down?
entry.summary:
Description

Once a maintainer of a project decides to step down of a project, the community needs to quickly adapt to this decision. This situation can be devastating for small projects and lead to their extinction. This talk demonstrates, based on the case of poliastro, that the community is a …
entry.content:
Description

Once a maintainer of a project decides to step down of a project, the community needs to quickly adapt to this decision. This situation can be devastating for small projects and lead to their extinction. This talk demonstrates, based on the case of poliastro, that the community is a key factor for a software to survive no matter who is leading it.
